name: QUACKTRIS
description:
Quacktris is a game where you play as a cute worker duck named Marcelo Menezes A.K.A Patolo, who has the job of assembling block pieces to a well known game ;)

FULLSCREEN IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Instructions

You have to assemble the designed piece at the given time to keep your score high and so as your health! Work harder, play harder!

Controls

Keyboard arrows - Controls Patolo

Spacebar - Lift and place blocks

This game was made by to the LD35 with the theme Shapeshift

@AndreYin
